step1.title: Elizabeth's Important Choice
step1.description: Elizabeth was walking home when she heard someone crying behind a nearby tree. She peeked around and saw a younger girl sitting on the ground, looking upset. Elizabeth felt a tug in her heart. Should she stop to help or continue home?

step2.title: A Kind Heart
step2.description: Elizabeth knelt beside the girl and asked what was wrong. The girl had lost her bracelet, a gift from her grandmother. Elizabeth could either help her search or encourage her to go home and ask for help there.

step3.title: Missed Opportunity
step3.description: Elizabeth kept walking, but her heart felt heavy. She thought about the girl’s tears and wondered if she should go back to check on her.

step4.title: The Lost Bracelet
step4.description: Elizabeth and the girl searched together. After a while, Elizabeth spotted the bracelet near a bush! The girl was overjoyed, and Elizabeth felt warmth in her heart for helping someone in need.

step5.title: A Hard Goodbye
step5.description: Elizabeth told the girl to go home and ask for help. The girl nodded sadly and walked away. Elizabeth hoped she had done the right thing but still felt unsure.

step6.title: A Heavy Heart
step6.description: Elizabeth arrived home but felt like she had missed a chance to do something kind. She prayed and asked God to help her listen to His voice next time.

step7.title: Friendship and Faith
step7.description: Elizabeth walked the girl home, and the girl’s mother thanked her with a big smile. Elizabeth realized that small acts of kindness could show God’s love in big ways.

step8.title: Lessons of the Heart
step8.description: That night, Elizabeth lay in bed thinking about the day. She knew God had given her a chance to show kindness. Next time, she promised she would always listen to that tug in her heart.
